edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.filter

Class GaussianFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.filter.Filter
      • edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.filter.GaussianFilter

  • public class GaussianFilter
extends Filter
    A Filter that applies a gaussian blur to a 2D Image.

    This Filter does not use a reference Image.

    The argument passed to the apply method is the Image to be blurred.

    Author:
    Colin J. Fuller

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        public void apply(Image im)
        Applies the GaussianFilter to the specified Image, blurring it by convolution with a Gaussian function.
        Specified by:
        apply in class Filter
        Parameters:
        im - The Image to process, which will be blurred.

      • setWidth

        public void setWidth(int width)
        Sets the width of the Gaussian filter. This is the standard deviation of the Gaussian function in units of pixels.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the Gaussian to be used for filtering, in pixels.
